name: Everlasting Summer: Spectacle? Spectacle!
description:
What is this mod about?
Simon is full of problems. The shift is coming to an end, and he has no idea what will happen to him next. Moreover, the performance that his friends started is on the verge of collapse.

What's in fashion?
Mysticism, pirates, role-playing games, love, hatred, loyalty of enemies and betrayal of friends. All this you will find in our mod.

And also, a lot of new, unique art, as well as familiar characters in absolutely incredible outfits and roles.

Mod completed?
The mod is debugged, proofread and completed. The walk will take approximately three hours.
